name: Airstrike (Vasilis Chonianakis)
description:
IN A WORLD WITH NO PEACE IN THE SKY
THE ROOT OF EVIL WOULD BE GOOD TO DIE...

Find and destroy the enemy base to win the game
before you run out of fuel



Avoid or destroy the turrets to protect yourself



Destroy these buildings to regain ammo (1st one) or health (2nd one)

     

Controls:

A,D or Arrow Keys - Rotate aircraft
Space - Shoot missiles
Enter - Interact with Menu
Escape - Return to Menu from Ingame

Credits:

Vasilis Chonianakis - Code, Design
Spyridon Glarakis - Graphics, Music, Sounds
